articles.title: Britain To Ban Sale Of Petrol, Diesel Cars From 2030 Under Green Plan - NDTV
articles.description: Britain will ban petrol and diesel vehicle sales from 2030 as part of a 10-point plan for a "green industrial revolution" to be unveiled Wednesday by Prime Minister Boris Johnson.
articles.content:
